description: Endpoint Selectable Volumes and Response Times

targets.rawSql:
select c.metric as metric,
c.time as time,
coalesce(d.value,0) as value from 
(select distinct a.database as metric,b.mtime_epoch as time from 
(select database from verb_stats where $__unixEpochFilter(mtime_epoch) and tqcount >= cast($min_GET as int) and verb='GET' and cluster=$cluster group by database) a , 
(select mtime_epoch from verb_stats where $__unixEpochFilter(mtime_epoch) group by mtime_epoch) b 
where a.database in ($database))c 
LEFT OUTER JOIN 
(select database as metric,mtime_epoch as time,sum(tqcount) as value from verb_stats
where $__unixEpochFilter(mtime_epoch) and verb='GET' and database in ($database) and cluster=$cluster
group by database,mtime_epoch)d 
ON (c.metric = d.metric and c.time = d.time)
order by time,metric

select c.metric as metric,
c.time as time,
coalesce(d.value,0) as value from 
(select distinct a.database as metric,b.mtime_epoch as time from 
(select database from verb_stats where $__unixEpochFilter(mtime_epoch) and tqcount >= cast($min_POST as int) and verb='POST' and cluster=$cluster  group by database) a , 
(select mtime_epoch from verb_stats where $__unixEpochFilter(mtime_epoch) group by mtime_epoch) b 
where a.database in ($database))c 
LEFT OUTER JOIN 
(select database as metric,mtime_epoch as time,sum(tqcount) as value from verb_stats
where $__unixEpochFilter(mtime_epoch) and verb='POST' and database in ($database) and cluster=$cluster
group by database,mtime_epoch)d 
ON (c.metric = d.metric and c.time = d.time)
order by time,metric

select c.metric as metric,
c.time as time,
coalesce(d.value,0) as value from 
(select distinct a.database as metric,b.mtime_epoch as time from 
(select database from verb_stats where $__unixEpochFilter(mtime_epoch) and ttrcount >= cast($min_GET as int) and verb='GET' and cluster=$cluster group by database) a , 
(select mtime_epoch from verb_stats where $__unixEpochFilter(mtime_epoch) group by mtime_epoch) b 
where a.database in ($database))c 
LEFT OUTER JOIN 
(select database as metric,mtime_epoch as time,
CASE WHEN sum(st2count+st3count+st4count+st5count) = 0 then sum(0) else 100*sum(st3count+st4count+st5count)/sum(st2count+st3count+st4count+st5count) end as value from verb_stats
where $__unixEpochFilter(mtime_epoch) and verb='GET' and database in ($database) and cluster=$cluster
group by database,mtime_epoch)d 
ON (c.metric = d.metric and c.time = d.time)
order by time,metric

where $__unixEpochFilter(mtime_epoch) and verb='POST' and database in ($database) and cluster=$cluster

list.name: cluster
list.query: select cluster from verb_stats  group by cluster

list.name: project
list.query: SELECT CASE WHEN  substring(database,0,position('_' in database)) = '' THEN 'others' ELSE substring(database,0,position('_' in database)) END as project from verb_stats where cluster = $cluster and database is not null group by project order by project

list.name: database
list.query: select database from verb_stats where cluster = $cluster and CASE WHEN substring(database,0,position('_' in database)) = '' THEN 'others' ELSE substring(database,0,position('_' in database)) END in ($project) order by database

title: Cluster Overview by Project
